title: Climbing out of bronze
body:
So after a good dozen games, where i found that bronze people don't ward, go aggressive when they are 1/5 behind and think it's a good idea to roam the enemy jungle at 8 minutes with 0 vision  and 2 lanes missing, i think i'm done with ranked solo.

So i'm looking for some friends to queue up with. I came from EUW where i played S1/G5, but got placed in B3 here (yay...). I main jungle and my second is top, although i do very much prefer jungling.

Looking for somebody who:
- Doesn't rage. First toxic words out of your mouth and you're blocked. I don't play this game for the toxicity.
- Has skype (and mic).
- Isn't stupid.

Let's face it, none of us are challengers, we all make mistakes. If we didn't, we'd be playing in challenger. But trying to duel a 11/3 cait with double farm and 3 more levels, is not good, no matter how good you are.

Add me on lol and let's play some games!

replies.body: I'd love to help ;) trynta escape b2 ahah

Hey man. My team is looking for  a jungler atm if your keen
{{sticker:slayer-jinx-catface}}
Haha, no it isn't.  Would you duo her at half health though? A silver player would.
just fell from b3 to b4
add me bro mid jg, here would love to play mid with a decent jg
